meanings.definition: People who are paid for their labor.
meanings.sent1: The wageworkers at the factory work hard every day.
meanings.sent2: Many wageworkers in the city commute to their jobs by bus.
meanings.sent3: The wageworkers decided to have a race during their lunch break.
meanings.sent4: The wageworkers are the gears that keep the economy moving.
meanings.sent5: The wageworkers' dedication is truly admirable.

meanings.definition: The group of individuals who earn money through employment.
meanings.sent1: Wageworkers contribute to the country's economy by working in various industries.
meanings.sent2: The wageworkers in the office enjoy their coffee breaks together.
meanings.sent3: The wageworkers organized a potluck to celebrate their hard work.
meanings.sent4: In the city, wageworkers can be seen bustling to their workplaces every morning.
meanings.sent5: The wageworkers' unity makes them a strong force in the workforce.
